  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>15484166-b463-4cb0-8410-7aac3bceba76#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">II. János Pál pápa</string>
            <string language="en">Pope John Paul II..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Papst John Paul II..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pape John Paul II..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Papa John Paul II..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Papa John Paul II..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παπάς John Paul ΙΙ ..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Papa Juan Paul II..</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A lengyel ellenzék jelentős erkölcsi támogatást kapott az 1980-as években a lengyel származású pápától.</string>
            <string language="en">The polish opposition became an important, moral aiding from the Pope of polish birth in the years of 1980</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">egyház,  szocializmus,  Szolidaritás,  </string>
            <string language="en">church, socialism, Solidarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die polnische Opposition wurde ein wichtiges, moralisches 
Helfen vom Papst der polnischen Geburt in den Jahren von 1980</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'opposition polonaise est devenue faciliter important et 
moral du pape de la naissance polonaise en années de 1980</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A oposição polonesa transformou-se ajudar importante, 
moral do papa do nascimento polonês nos anos de 1980</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'opposizione polacca si è transformata in aiutare 
importante e morale dal papa della nascita polacca durante gli anni di
1980</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αντίθεση στιλβωτικής ουσίας έγινε μια σημαντική, 
ηθική βοήθεια από τον παπά της γέννησης στιλβωτικής ουσίας τα 
έτη 1980</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La oposición polaca se convirtió en el ayudar 
importante, moral del papa del nacimiento polaco en los años de el an
o 80</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kirche, sozialismus, solidarität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">église, socialisme, solidarité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">igreja, socialismo, solidarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chiesa, socialism, solidarietà</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκκλησία, σοσιαλισμός, αλληλεγγύη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">iglesia, socialismo, solidaridad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
